parse: Interrogative / Indefinite Pronoun - Nominative Masculine Plural
str2: Any one, some one, a certain one or thing. An enclitic indefinite pronoun; some or any person or object.
The, the definite article. Including the feminine he, and the neuter to in all their inflections; the definite article; the.
From gramma. A writer, i.e. scribe or secretary.

parse: Verb - Aorist Indicative Active - 3rd Person Plural
str2: Answer, bid, bring word, command. A primary verb; to speak or say.
In, on, among. A primary preposition denoting position, and instrumentality, i.e. A relation of rest; 'in, ' at, on, by, etc.

parse: Reflexive Pronoun - Dative Masculine 3rd Person Plural
Verb - Present Indicative Active - 3rd Person Singular
str2: From blasphemos; to vilify; specially, to speak impiously.
